KingContract.Name: Bounty Helper
KingContract.Description: You can complete the bounty quest the moment you accept it.

KingContract.Name: Lord of Time
KingContract.Description: No Balens will be used when ending cooldowns for Forgotten Catacombs and Solo Dungeon blitz.

KingContract.Name: Warrior's Call
KingContract.Description: A powerful buff that lasts 30 minutes. Can only be used in dungeons and the Crypt.

KingContract.Name: Warrior's Call
KingContract.Description:
PATK +10% PDEF +10% MATK +10% MDEF +10% HP +10% Troop Count +10%
Only applies in dungeons, the Forgotten Catacombs and the Tormented Necropolis.

KingContract.Name: Skill Master
KingContract.Description: Used to reset skills and talents for free.

KingContract.Name: Monster Radar
KingContract.Description: Used to locate BOSSes' coordinate in the Wild.

KingContract.Name: BOSS Attack
KingContract.Description: Used to automatically navigate in the World BOSS.

KingContract.Name: Circuit Master
KingContract.Description: Auto accepts a new Circuit Quest.

KingContract.Name: Archaeology Auto-path
KingContract.Description: Click to automatically move to the archaeological spot.

KingContract.Name: Auto Routing in Forbidden Land
KingContract.Description: Auto Routing to BOSS location in Forbidden Land
